1. Test Case: Tracking Customer Transaction History
2. Preconditions: Test customer account created with multiple transactions
3. Steps:
* Login to loyalty platform as merchant customer
* Navigate to customer account page
* Verify that customer transaction history is accurately displayed
* Manually add a new transaction to the customer account
* Refresh the page and verify that the new transaction is displayed
4. Expected Result: Loyalty platform accurately displays customer transaction history and new transactions are promptly updated in the system.
5. Test Case: Assigning Rewards to Customers
6. Preconditions: Test customer account created
7. Steps:
* Login to loyalty platform as merchant customer
* Navigate to customer account page
* Select a customer to assign a reward to
* Create a new reward or select an existing reward to assign
* Save the changes to the customer account
* Verify that the reward is correctly applied to the customer's account
4. Expected Result: Loyalty platform allows merchant customers to easily assign rewards to customers and rewards are correctly applied to customer accounts.
5. Test Case: Customer Data Tracking
6. Preconditions: Test customer accounts with different behaviors and preferences created
7. Steps:
* Login to loyalty platform as merchant customer
* Navigate to customer data page
* Verify that customer data is accurately displayed, including transaction history, preferences, and behavior patterns
* Manually add a new customer behavior or preference to a test customer account
* Refresh the page and verify that the new data is displayed
4. Expected Result: Loyalty platform accurately tracks customer data and updates in real-time.
5. Test Case: Customizing Loyalty Program
6. Preconditions: Test customer accounts created
7. Steps:
* Login to loyalty platform as merchant customer
* Navigate to loyalty program settings
* Change reward structure, earning rules, or redemption options
* Save the changes to the loyalty program
* Verify that the changes are correctly applied to customer accounts
4. Expected Result: Loyalty platform allows merchant customers to easily customize the loyalty program to suit their individual needs and changes are correctly applied to customer accounts.
5. Test Case: Dashboard Usability
6. Preconditions: Test customer accounts created
7. Steps:
* Login to loyalty platform as merchant customer
* Navigate to dashboard page
* Add and manage rewards for test customers
* Verify that the process is intuitive and efficient
* Manually refresh the page and verify that changes are promptly updated in the system
4. Expected Result: Loyalty platform dashboard is user-friendly and allows merchant customers to efficiently manage rewards and customer accounts.
5. Test Case: Analytics and Reporting
6. Preconditions: Test customer accounts with different behaviors and preferences created
7. Steps:
* Login to loyalty platform as merchant customer
* Navigate to analytics or reporting page
* Generate a report on customer activity
* Verify that the report accurately reflects customer behavior and preferences
* Manually add a new customer behavior or preference to a test customer account
* Refresh the page and verify that the new data is included in the report
4. Expected Result: Loyalty platform analytics and reporting provide accurate and meaningful insights on customer behavior and preferences.
5. Test Case: Integration with Marketing Platforms
6. Preconditions: Test email marketing tool account created
7. Steps:
* Login to loyalty platform as merchant customer
* Navigate to loyalty program settings
* Link the loyalty program to a test email marketing tool
* Create a loyalty program promotion in the email marketing tool
* Verify that the promotion is successfully sent to test customers
4. Expected Result: Loyalty platform integrates seamlessly with marketing platforms to allow merchant customers to easily promote the loyalty program to customers.

All test cases have passed successfully. We are now ready to move to the Go-to-market phase. Go-to-market consists of the following documents:
Product Brief - a summary brief outlining the functionality in the release and aimed towards internal marketing teams
Release Notes - basic outline of contents of new release: outline of new functionality introduced and existing functionality fixed
Internal FAQs - answers to most common questions expected to be asked by internal staff regarding new release
External FAQs - answers to most common questions expected to be asked by customers regarding new release
User Documentation - instruction guide for customers on how to use new functionality
Newsletter Entry - short summary of functionality for customer newsletter
Internal Presentation - internal company presentation for sales, partnerships, marketing, customer success, customer support, implementation teams to provide high level summary and outline key features/benefits of new functionality being released
Create all of the Go-to-market documents for the Loyalty Platform release.

Product Brief:
The Loyalty Platform is a new feature that enables our merchant customers to track and reward their customers who make repeat transactions. The loyalty platform also provides additional buyer insights for our customers. With this platform, our merchant customers can efficiently track and reward their loyal customers while also gaining valuable insights into their customer base.

Release Notes:
The Loyalty Platform release introduces the following new functionality:

* A loyalty platform that enables our merchant customers to track and reward their customers who make repeat transactions and provides additional buyer insights
* Customizable loyalty program to maximize the value for customers
* Integration with existing marketing platforms to easily promote loyalty programs to customers

Internal FAQs:

1. What is the Loyalty Platform?
The Loyalty Platform is a new feature that enables our merchant customers to track and reward their customers who make repeat transactions. The loyalty platform also provides additional buyer insights for our customers.
2. How does the Loyalty Platform work?
The Loyalty Platform allows merchants to assign rewards to their customers for repeat purchases, track customer data to understand behaviour and preferences better, and customize the loyalty program to their individual needs.
3. Can the Loyalty Platform be integrated with existing marketing platforms?
Yes, the Loyalty Platform can be integrated with existing marketing platforms to easily promote loyalty programs to customers.

External FAQs:

1. What is the Loyalty Platform?
The Loyalty Platform is a new feature that enables merchants to track and reward their customers who make repeat transactions. The loyalty platform also provides additional buyer insights.
2. How do I access the Loyalty Platform?
The Loyalty Platform is accessible through the merchant dashboard.
3. How do I assign rewards to my customers?
Merchants can assign rewards to their customers through the Loyalty Platform and can customize the loyalty program to maximize the value for their customers.

User Documentation:
The Loyalty Platform User Guide provides step-by-step instructions for merchants to use the new functionality. The guide includes information on how to track customer data, assign rewards, customize the loyalty program, and integrate with existing marketing platforms.

Newsletter Entry:
Introducing our new Loyalty Platform! Our merchant customers can now efficiently track and reward their loyal customers while also gaining valuable insights into their customer base. With customizable loyalty programs and integration with existing marketing platforms, the Loyalty Platform is the perfect tool to maximize customer loyalty.

Internal Presentation:

The loyalty platform also provides additional buyer insights for our customers. With customizable loyalty programs and integration with existing marketing platforms, the Loyalty Platform is the perfect tool to maximize customer loyalty. Key features of the Loyalty Platform include the ability to track customer data, assign rewards, and customize the loyalty program to individual needs.
Create the user guide for the loyalty platform

Welcome to the user guide for the Loyalty Platform! This guide will walk you through the features and functionality of the platform so that you can use it to track and reward your customers who make repeat transactions, as well as gain additional buyer insights.

Getting Started
To get started with the Loyalty Platform, you will need to create an account and log in. Once you have logged in, you will be taken to your dashboard, which provides an overview of your loyalty program and customer activity.

Tracking Repeat Transactions
To track your customers' repeat transactions, navigate to the "Customers" section of your dashboard. Here, you will see a list of your customers and their transaction history. You can filter this list by various criteria, including the number of transactions and the total amount spent. Use these filters to identify your repeat customers and reward them accordingly.

Assigning Rewards
To assign rewards to your customers, navigate to the "Rewards" section of your dashboard. Here, you can create custom rewards and assign them to individual customers or groups of customers. You can also set rules for when rewards are earned, such as after a certain number of transactions or a certain amount spent.

Tracking Customer Data
To track customer data and gain additional buyer insights, navigate to the "Analytics" section of your dashboard. Here, you can view reports and analytics on customer engagement, such as the number of repeat customers and the average purchase amount. You can also track customer behaviour and preferences, such as which products or services they purchase most frequently.

Customizing Your Loyalty Program
To customize your loyalty program, navigate to the "Settings" section of your dashboard. Here, you can set up your program rules and branding, such as the name of your program and the rewards you offer. You can also customize your program to fit your business needs, such as by setting different rewards for different customer segments or by integrating with other marketing platforms.

Getting Help
If you need help using the Loyalty Platform, you can contact our customer support team at any time. Simply navigate to the "Help" section of your dashboard and click "Contact Us" to send a message.

Thank you for choosing the Loyalty Platform! We hope this guide has been helpful in getting you started with the platform.
